oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Household of Faith COGIC: front view
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: West, Carroll Van, photographer
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Household of Faith Church of God in Christ

Color photograph of church front facing street. Brick church contains a gable roof, steeple, and central double doors. A large gable vent appears above the front entrance's awning. Church sign is located to the right of the building. Sign reads, "Household of Faith COGIC Church of God in Christ; Sunday School 10:00; Morning Service 11:00; Y.P.W.W. 6:30; Evening Service 7:30; Wednesday Bible Study 7:30."
Located in Cleveland, Tennessee, Household of Faith Church of God in Christ's current building dates back to 1960. At the time of fieldwork, Clifton Braden served as pastor.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: African American Churches -- Tennessee
